short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Blue Wallpaper turn new tab to custom HD Blue background. Blue wallpaper background themes for fans.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Extension Features:

1. Automatically shuffle Blue wallpapers each time a new tab is opened.
2. Customize your Blue background by randomizing or favoriting it in the selection panel.
3. Integrated Google search bar.
4. Direct links for easy access to emails and social networks.
5. Automatically displays the current date and time.
6. Notepad feature for jotting down tasks.
7. Quick links to frequently visited sites.
8. Convenient access to your bookmarks.
9. Shortcut panel addition for quick website access.
10. Fast access to Google applications.
11. Direct link to more themes.
12. Simplified social media sharing.
13. Easy wallpaper download.
14. Quick links to gaming portals.
15. Activate entertaining animations like snow, rain, falling leaves, and fireworks on the Blue new tab.
